attributes.action: We want a Bank Holiday Thursday every single year.
attributes.additional_details: Because we deserve a Bank Holiday Thursday in the summer every single year.
attributes.background: Ensure we have a Bank Holiday Thursday in the summer every single year.

rejection.details:
We understand you want a bank holiday on a Thursday every year, but it's not clear which Thursday you want it to fall on.

You might like to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:

Make the Queens Platinum Jubilee a permanent Bank Holiday: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615603

Please note that, if you choose to start a new petition in future, we can only accept petitions started using the full name of the individual starting the petition, not the name of an organisation or business.
